messages: f6b127e38214e484df709cbee84fa242 (19:24): Question: Is 7dBi gain a large increase?
baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:25): Xorlev, yes
baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:26): over 2-3dBi its substantially greater
f6b127e38214e484df709cbee84fa242 (19:26): Somewhere in the range of 5x if my homework is correct...
baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:26): every 3dB doubles your range
f6b127e38214e484df709cbee84fa242 (19:27): Nice. I'm going to order a small antenna with a 7dBi gain with an MC card connector (apparently not MCXX, but MC *shrug*)
19844621d8360b06ef4a77071e97cb59 (19:38): i have an aspire 3610 laptop
19844621d8360b06ef4a77071e97cb59 (19:38): with an bcm43xx wireless card series
19844621d8360b06ef4a77071e97cb59 (19:38): i can't get it working on my linux system

baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:39): last i checked there is only limited support for those cards

baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:39): but they require latest versions of the kernel
baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:39): and some other junk

19844621d8360b06ef4a77071e97cb59 (19:40): i'm really pissed off

805ab4afca678856555917da8fef70d0 (19:50): do u know if the UBIQUITI PCMCIA 300mW what type of antenna works with i know it is the MMCX but is it male or female?
baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:51): cacaman, i remember having used it
baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:51): but nothing about it
baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:52): samudio, the card should have a female connector.
baa3f5a982255619025c62ba5c78e1b6 (19:52): samudio, any wifi antenna with a mmcx connector will work.
805ab4afca678856555917da8fef70d0 (19:53): but the thing is
805ab4afca678856555917da8fef70d0 (19:53): i have a RPSMA Antena and im looking for the pigtail or something

805ab4afca678856555917da8fef70d0 (19:53): so i dont know
805ab4afca678856555917da8fef70d0 (19:54): which connector weather the  mmcx male to rpsma male or mmcx female to rpsma male
